2K Games | Novato, CA | ONSITE | 2k.com

2K Games is a purveyor of fine video game entertainment. We have a number of open positions for roles in game development and game publishing.

My team builds services for game developers, we have several open positions on the game side and on the server side. On the game side as you know it's generally C++ and on the server side we are using Java and Python.
